item.description:
Come out and enjoy the excitement of a fellow NHC member's birthday as Danita celebrates her special day in true Collective fashion with a downtown bar crawl. After all, the next day is Good Friday and you probably have it off from work anyways (whoo hoo)

The evening will begin with dinner at 7:30pm at Pacifico on College Street.

From there the group moves on to:

Firehouse 12 - 9pm-10pm
Â½ price drafts

Geronimo - 10pm-11pm
Great margaritas/tequila and outdoor patio with space heaters

BAR -11pm- ?????
$2.00 drafts till 11:30

If you wanna join in the fun but aren't up for a full evening, just give Danita a call and she'll let you know where to meet up with the group.

***Note***If you're interested in attending the dinner portion of the evening, please note it in your RSVP by Wednesday so as to assure proper seating at Pacifico.
item.name: Dinner, Drinks and Dancing with Danita
